<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs=""
>
[Thurible of Revelation](/Equipment.aspx?ID=267)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 575 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This brass censer dangles on a length of chain. Most _thuribles of revelation_ are adorned with swirling Celestial text, though some are iron and feature Infernal or Abyssal text.

<document level="2" id="action-175" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Thurible of Revelation (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 575 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 55 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 10"
pfs="Standard"
>
Thurible of Revelation (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 575 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 900 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The thurible grants a +2 bonus. Once per day, when you activate the thurible, you can increase its revelations. During that activation, you can hold the thurible up to your eyes with an Interact action to gain the effects of [_see invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=271) for 1 round by peering through the smoke.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 18"
pfs="Standard"
>
Thurible of Revelation (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 575 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 19,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The thurible grants a +3 bonus. The greater version shares the once-per-day enhanced revelations of the moderate version, except peering through the smoke also grants you the effects of [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344).
